body:
<CHART id="${2}" type="pie" showlegend="bottom">
	<XAXIS type="category" title="Money" />
	<YAXIS type="numeric" />
	<SERIES name="" type="pie" data="${1}" x="{data.x}" y="{data.y}" label="{data.x}: {data.y}" />
</CHART>

<CHART id="${2}">
	<XAXIS type="category" title="Category"/>
	<YAXIS type="numeric" title="Number" />
	<SERIES id="${3}" name="Bar Series 1" group="1" type="bar" data="${1}" x="{data.x}" y="{data.y}" color="lightblue" />
</CHART>

<CHART id="${2}" showlegend="true">
	<XAXIS type="category" title="Category" />
	<YAXIS type="numeric" title="Number" />
	<SERIES id="${3}" name="Line Series 1" type="line" data="${1}" x="{data.x1}" y="{data.y1}" color="" stroke="2" showarea="true" showpoints="false" />
	<SERIES id="${4}" name="Line Series 2" type="line" data="${1}" x="{data.x2}" y="={data.y2}" color="" stroke="4.5" radius="5"/>
	<SERIES id="${5}" name="Line Series 3" type="line" data="${1}" x="{data.x3}" y="={data.y3}" color="" showline="false" radius="3.5"/>
</CHART>
Multi-Series Line CHART [FML].description: A Line Chart snippet with multiple series

body:
<CHART id="${2}" showlegend="true">
	<XAXIS type="category" title="Category" />
	<YAXIS type="numeric" title="Number" />
	<SERIES name="Bar Series 1" type="bar" data="${1}" x="={data.x1}" y="{data.y1}" color="cyan" stroke="1" />
	<SERIES name="Line Series 1" type="line" data="${1}" x="={data.x2}" y="{data.y2}" color="red" stroke="2" showarea="true" showpoints="false" />
</CHART>
Combination Series CHART [FML].description: A Combination Chart snippet with both a Line & a Bar series
